mapper.select: SELECT ip.item_id, i.name AS itemName, ip.product_id; (SELECT p.name FROM equipment_shop_product p where ip.product_id = p.id) AS productName, ip.remark FROM equipment_standard_item i LEFT JOIN equipment_standard_item_product ip ON i.id = ip.item_id WHERE i.stand_id = #{id} ORDER BY ip.item_id;
